name: Wild Growth - GGJ 2023
description:
One night, Stanley woke to find his ceiling leaking a mysterious gold liquid. The liquid, which Stanley unofficially coined “Liquid Magic”, seemed to grow his plants at an unnaturally accelerated rate! Stanley has been using the Liquid Magic to grow his plants and sell them at his family’s plant shop. Stanley had found quick success with his new business venture; however, he will soon find that too much of a good thing may have unfortunate consequences…

  • Control Stanley by moving left and right using the arrow keys or A and D on keyboard or D-pad or Analog-stick on Controller.
  • Catch the Liquid Magic drops (yellow) to grow Stanley’s plant.
  • Catch the regular water drops (blue) for additional points!
  • The larger your plant, the more roots will grow. The roots will start to slow you down, be careful!
  • Miss three Liquid Magic drops and it’s Game Over!
